boardgame.name: Fields of Fire
boardgame.description: From publisher's website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fields of Fire is a solitaire game of commanding a rifle company between World War II and Present Day. The game is different from many tactical games in that it is diceless and card based. There are two decks used to play. The Terrain Deck is based on a specific region and is used to build a map for the various missions your company must perform. The Action deck serves many purposes in controlling combat, command and control, various activity attempts. The units of the company are counters representing headquarters elements, squads, weapons teams, forward observers, individual vehicles or helicopters. A single game is a mission and several missions from a historical campaign are strung together for the player to manage experience and replacements. A mission can be played in about 1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; 4 hours._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game is based on three actual campaigns experienced by units of the 9th US Infantry (Regiment) in World War II, Korea, and Vietnam. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Keep Up the Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; is the motto of the 9th Infantry (Regiment), known as the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Manchus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; for their service in the Boxer Rebellion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2008 Charles S. Roberts Best Post-WW2 era Board Game Nominee
2010 Games Magazine Best New Historical Simulation Game Winner
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 11: How many sessions before judgment?
I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 34: Ben Hull
I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 60: Making history with Microscope, and games that tell stories

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: For sale here is one brand new, factory sealed, boxed wargame. Fields of Fire-Great new solitaire game from GMT games. Buy it here for the discounted price of $49.95. Shipping: USA Trackable $5.95 Canada $24.95 Anywhere else $39.95. Shipping rate outside of USA includes insurance. Paypal preferred.

When this arrived, the shrinkwrap was pulling away from the seams, so I went ahead and pulled it off. The box has never actually been opened. After reading the comments, I realized that Fields of Fire just wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t going to hit my table often.

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Boardgame Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. FIELDS OF FIRE: $45.95 ...in stock now...no waiting! GMT Games [GMT 0813] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $13.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

GMT Games (GMT 0816) Components: Action Deck + Hint Cards - 55 Cards 3 Terrain Decks of 55 Cards, total of 165 Terrain Cards Rule Booklet Mission Briefing Booklet Company Log Pad (8.5x11 - expendable) 1 x 8.5 x 11 Player Aid Card Action Menu Front Vehicle Info Back 9-12 8.5x11 Mission Cards (each mission has a card friendly info on the front, enemy info on the back) 536 Unit Counters (Large Size Two-Sided) 234 Informational Markers Fields of Fire is a solitaire game of commanding a rifle company between World War II and Present Day. The game is different from many tactical games in that it is diceless and card based. There are two decks used to play. The Terrain Deck is based on a specific region and is used to build a map for the various missions your company must perform. The Action deck serves many purposes in controlling combat, command and control, various activity attempts. The units of the company are counters representing headquarters elements, squads, weapons teams, forward observers, individual vehicles or helicopters. A single playing is a mission and several missions from an historical campaign are strung together for the player to manage experience and replacements. A mission can be played in about 1 - 2 hours. This game is based on three actual campaigns experienced by units of the 9th US Infantry in World War II, Korea, and Vietnam. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Keep Up the Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is the motto of the 9th Infantry, known as the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Manchus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for their service in the Boxer Rebellion. Common Components: Action Deck + Hint Cards - 55 Cards Rule Booklet Mission Briefing (historical notes and covers all organization for all three eras) Company Log Pad (8.5x11 - expendable) 1 x 8.5 x 11 Player Aid Card Action Menu Front - Vehicle Info Back Informational Markers - 234 US Common - 72 WWII Normandy Campaign Components 1 Normandy Terrain Deck of 55 Terrain Cards 3 or 4 8.5x11 Mission Cards (each mission has a card - friendly info on the front, enemy info on the back) US WWII - 64 unit counters German - 80 unit counters 2nd Infantry Division _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Indianhead_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; patch Korea - Naktong River Campaign Components 1 Korea Terrain Deck of 55 Terrain Cards 3 or 4 8.5x11 Mission Cards (each mission has a card - friendly info on the front, enemy info on the back) US Korea - 72 unit counters North Koreans - 96 unit counters 25th Infantry Division _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Tropic Lightning_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; patch Vietnam Campaign Components 1 Vietnam Lowlands Terrain Deck of 55 Terrain Cards 3 or 4 8.5x11 Mission Cards (each mission has a card - friendly info on the front, enemy info on the back) US Vietnam - 64 unit counters VC/NVA - 88 unit counters Designed by Ben Hull

Complete and in top-notch condition. Counters are 95% punched, clipped, sorted, and bagged. Mission pad still mostly complete. Box is pristine. The only component to show any wear is the action deck, which shows a little usage. Vietnam deck is still in the shrink. Does not yet include the errata counters, although they may be obtained for free direct from GMT. Shipping weight is 3lb 1oz, so shipping in the US will most likely be $10.35 for flat-rate shipping, although if you are close to CA regular Priority Mail may be cheaper.

New/sealed item! Fast shipping! Pay via paypal to maydaygames@gmail.com or save 2% by paying to existingfunds@sphiatt.com instead with existing paypal funds. Buyer to pay just $9.95 shipping! Yes we can combine shipping on multiple items! Save even more! Please paypal payments to maydaygames@gmail.com or save 2% by sending payments to existingfunds@sphiatt.com instead. Be SURE you include what item you are buying with the payment. Yes we can combine orders at significant shipping discounts. Please paypal payments to maydaygames@gmail.com. Be SURE you include what item you are buying with the payment. Combined shipping works as follows for domestic (48 lower states) orders: Highest price shipping item: Full shipping cost 2nd-4th highest priced items: 50% off shipping cost for each of these items. 5th-10th highest priced shipping items: 60% off shipping costs for each of these items. 11th+ highest priced shipping items: 75% off shipping for all the rest of the items. As an example say you purchased 15 games, 3 of them with $10 shipping, 5 of them with $8 shipping and 7 of them with $4 shipping. The total shipping for the 15 items would be: Full shipping on the first item: $10.00 50% off shipping on items 2-4: $14.00 (50% off $10, $10 and $8, the next highest shipping cost items) 60% off shipping on items 5-10: $14.40 (60% off of 3 items at $8 shipping and 3 more items at $4 shipping = $36) 75% off shipping on items 11-15: $4.00 (75% off 4 items at $4) Total shipping on these 15 items then would be $10+$14+$14.40 + $4 = $42.40 shipping. This is just an example and your results will vary depending on what you buy of course!

The item must be in the same condition that it was sent. I cannot refund the shipping cost.

Shrink removed but game is unpunched.

All of the game components (cards, counters, rules, player aids, box etc) are in super condition. I actually played the game 4 times. I will include the score sheet I produced and my revised player mat. The punched counters have been carefully separated, trimmed, sorted and bagged. Some of the counters are unpunched and the official replacement counters have been incorporated. The player aids have five very small, neat handwritten notes added but these help with play anyway. I am very picky about game condition and I would be very happy to receive this game. Postage and Packing:- UK - First Class: £7.00 EU - Air Mail: £11.00 Rest of World - Air mail: £23:00

The item listed is only for purchase by: pbice The price has been set at the winning bid, or Buy It Now, price posted to the auction item comment page. If you won multiple items, please be sure to add them all to your cart at once and then check out so I can include them in your shipping estimate. As a reminder: I will only ship to the addresses within the United States. I only accept PayPal and payment details will be sent alongside your final invoice. Your item(s) will ship on the Saturday FOLLOWING verified payment. I will provide tracking information for your item and insurance sufficient to cover the final price of the auction on shipped items. Please inspect your items within the first 5 business days of receipt, beyond that I cannot assist with disputes. I also make no guarantees implied or otherwise as to the condition of games if the carrier has been rough with shipping. I pack games in peanuts and try to ensure both the games and their contents are secured inside the boxes to minimize issues. If you fail to pay for your item within 5 business days, I will cancel the sale and list the item on eBay and you can re-bid on it there at that time. If you have any special requests, please Geekmail me so we can discuss prior to payment finalization. Thank you for your purchase and I hope you enjoy your new game(s)!
